DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of ONO-5046Na in patients with acute respiratory failure associated with community-acquired pneumonia
DOC.brief_title: Controlled Study of ONO-5046Na in Patients With Acute Respiratory Failure Associated With Community-Acquired Pneumonia
DOC.criteria: Patients with communityacquired pneumonia Patients with acute respiratory failure Patients with nosocomial pneumonia Patients on mechanical ventilation
